CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper July 28, 1945, pg. 1, reads: "Investiture - The Order of St. James is conferred upon the Rev. J. Pickford Roberts at Calvary ME Church, Allegheny and Beech Avenue, North Side, Tuesday morning. The Rev. Mr. Roberts is rector of St. Thomas Church, New York City, and was one of the principles aiding in the ceremony of the Order of Antioch. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Rev. Howard Mather of Order of Antioch bestowing order of St. James on Rev. J. Pickford Roberts in Calvary Methodist Episcopal (United Methodist) Church, 971 Beech Avenue, Northside
